install.name: Fabrik table
install.author: Rob Clayburn
install.copyright: (C) 2006 Pollen 8 Design Ltd. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows a Fabrik table.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: table_id
param.label: Table
param.description: The Fabrik table id that you want to show

param.name: limit
param.label: Number of records to show
param.description: Leave blank, or enter 0 to default to the table's settings. If random records selected the first record is selected randomly and the records immediately it, totaling the limit length, will be returned
